monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart
increment_kings_purse egypt 100 ;2 Arish, Tayma
increment_kings_purse turks 200 ;4 Hamadan, Al_Mayadin, Resafa, Tadmur
increment_kings_purse kwarezm 50 ;1 Khiva
increment_kings_purse moors 250 ;5 Tangiers, Oran, Achir, Sijilmassa, Taroudant
increment_kings_purse lithuania 50 ;1 Rostock
;increment_kings_purse cumans 100 ;2 Jaiksk, Embi
increment_kings_purse byzantium 500 ;10 Caffa, Athens, Scopia, Epathos, Philadelphia, Rhodes, Marmaris, Tarsus, Yambol, Constantia
increment_kings_purse russia 50 ;1 Yuryev
increment_kings_purse kievan_rus 150 ;3 Zhytomyr, Bryansk, Novhorod_Siverskyi
increment_kings_purse venice 50 ;1 Spalato
increment_kings_purse sicily 100 ;2 Syracuse, Tarento
increment_kings_purse milan 50 ;1 Ajaccio
increment_kings_purse denmark 50 ;1 Riba
increment_kings_purse scotland 100 ;2 Berwick, Aberdeen
increment_kings_purse france 50 ;1 Troyes
increment_kings_purse hre 100 ;2 Speyer, Hamburg
increment_kings_purse england 50 ;1 Exeter
increment_kings_purse poland 50 ;1 Lublin
increment_kings_purse spain 50 ;1 Salamanca
increment_kings_purse hungary 100 ;2 Brasov, Zagreb
increment_kings_purse aragon 50 ;1 Huesca
increment_kings_purse norway 100 ;2 Eikundarsund, Mann
increment_kings_purse jerusalem 100 ;2 Tiberias, Tartus ;3 - Krak_de_Chevalier
increment_kings_purse slave 3600 ;72
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event GeneralCaptureResidence FactionType egypt
	;BRITAIN
	if I_CompareCounter Thurso_owner != 1
		if I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt general, 0 53,266 ;Thurso_Fort
			set_event_counter minor_settlement_income_change 1 ;
			set_counter Thurso_owner 1
			increment_kings_purse egypt 50
		end_if
		if I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt named_character, 0 53,266 ;Thurso_Fort
			set_event_counter minor_settlement_income_change 1 ;
			set_counter Thurso_owner 1
			increment_kings_purse egypt 50
		end_if
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter Mann_owner != 1
		if I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt general, 0 45,236 ;Mann_Fort
			set_event_counter minor_settlement_income_change 2 ;
			set_counter Mann_owner 1
			increment_kings_purse egypt 50
		end_if
		if I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt named_character, 0 45,236 ;Mann_Fort
			set_event_counter minor_settlement_income_change 2 ;
			set_counter Mann_owner 1
			increment_kings_purse egypt 50
		end_if
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter Thurso_owner != 9
		if I_CharacterTypeNearTile byzantium general, 0 53,266 ;Thurso_Fort
			set_event_counter minor_settlement_income_change 1 ;
			set_counter Thurso_owner 9
			increment_kings_purse byzantium 50
		end_if

			set_counter Thurso_owner 9

		end_if
	end_if

monitor_event GeneralCaptureResidence FactionType sicily
	;BRITAIN
	if I_CompareCounter Thurso_owner != 13

monitor_event GeneralCaptureResidence FactionType slave
	;BRITAIN
	if I_CompareCounter Thurso_owner != 0
		if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave general, 0 53,266 ;Thurso_Fort
			set_event_counter minor_settlement_income_change 1 ;
			set_counter Thurso_owner 0
			increment_kings_purse slave 50
		end_if
		if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave named_character, 0 53,266 ;Thurso_Fort
			set_event_counter minor_settlement_income_change 1 ;
			set_counter Thurso_owner 0
			increment_kings_purse slave 50
		end_if
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter Mann_owner != 0
		if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave general, 0 45,236 ;Mann_Fort
			set_event_counter minor_settlement_income_change 2 ;
			set_counter Mann_owner 0
			increment_kings_purse slave 50
		end_if
		if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave named_character, 0 45,236 ;Mann_Fort
			set_event_counter minor_settlement_income_change 2 ;
			set_counter Mann_owner 0
			increment_kings_purse slave 50
		end_if
	end_if

monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType minor_settlement_income_change
and EventCounter < 123
	if I_EventCounter minor_settlement_income_change = 1
		if I_CompareCounter Thurso_owner = 1
			increment_kings_purse egypt -50
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter Thurso_owner = 2
			increment_kings_purse turks -50
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter Thurso_owner = 3
			increment_kings_purse timurids -50
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter Thurso_owner = 4
			increment_kings_purse kwarezm -50
		end_if

		end_if

		end_if
